full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL GSANG BA 'DUS PA'I RTZA RGYUD RGYUD PHYI MA DANG BCAS PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @104B (AOm SVA STI, GSAL BYED NANG NA NYIN BYED DBANG PO DANG, RGYU SKAR KHROD NA GNYIS SKYES RGYAL PO LTAR, THUB PA'I LEGS BSHAD KUN GYI DBUS NA MTHO, ,DPAL LDAN GSANG BA 'DUS PA'I RGYUD RGYAL 'DI, ,DAD LDAN DGE SLONG DKON MCHOG CES BYA BAS, ,CHOS SBYIN SPEL PHYIR SPAR DU BSGRUB PA LA, ,SGO GSUM ZANG ZING CI RIGS PHAN BYED PAS, ,THOG DRUNGS MAR GYUR 'GRO BA MA LUS PA, ,RIM GNYIS LAM GYI RTOGS @105A *, ,PA MTHAR PHYIN SHOG ,CHOS SBYIN 'DI LA 'ONGS PA'I GLEGS BAM MCHOG ,YANGS PA'I RGYAL KHAMS KUN TU RGYAS GYUR CIG , ,,DE LA 'CHAD NYAN BYED PA'I MKHAS MANG TSOGS, ,RGYA BOD HOR SOGS YUL TU KHYAB GYUR CIG , ,,)
